com.ihealth.communication.manager

Class iHealthDevicesUpgradeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.manager.iHealthDevicesUpgradeManager

  • public class iHealthDevicesUpgradeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Upgrade util class.
    • This is a singleton class, use getInstance() to get the instance.
    • Use queryUpgradeInfoFromDeviceAndCloud(String, String) to get version info from device and cloud.
    • Use isUpgradeState(String, String) to get the upgrade state of the device.
    • Use startUpGrade(String, String) to start upgrade.
    • Use stopUpgrade(String, String) to stop upgrade

        (Internal method)Get UpGrade Device control
        Should not call directly.
        Parameters:
        mac - the mac address of the device.
        type - the type of the device.

      • queryUpgradeInfoFromDeviceAndCloud

        public void queryUpgradeInfoFromDeviceAndCloud(java.lang.String mac,
                                               java.lang.String type)
        Get version information from device and cloud.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_INFO or UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_CLOUD_FIRMWARE_VERSION.
          • The keys of the message will show in KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_ERROR
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        mac - The mac address of the device.
        type - The type of the device.

      • startUpGrade

        public void startUpGrade(java.lang.String mac,
                         java.lang.String type)
        Start to upgrade for the specified device.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If start successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be:
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_START_DOWNLOAD
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_DOWNLOADING
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_DOWNLOAD_COMPLETED
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_START_UP
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_PROGRESS
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_FINISH_UP
          • The keys of the message will show in KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be UpgradeProfile.DEVICE_UP_ERROR
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        mac - the mac address of the device.
        type - the type of the device.

      • stopUpgrade

        public void stopUpgrade(java.lang.String mac,
                        java.lang.String type)
        Stop upgrade for specified device.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If stop successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action is UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_STOP_UP.
          • The message will be null.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_ERROR
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        mac - the mac address of the device.
        type - the type of the device.

      • isUpgradeState

        public boolean isUpgradeState(java.lang.String mac,
                              java.lang.String type)
        Get device upgrade state.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_ERROR
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        mac - the mac address of the device.
        type - the type of the device.
        Returns:
        true if device is in upgrade progress, false if not.

      • startUpGrade

        public void startUpGrade(java.lang.String mac,
                         java.lang.String type,
                         java.lang.String fwPath,
                         java.lang.String fwInfoPath,
                         long crc,
                         java.lang.String appSecret)
        Start to upgrade for the specified device.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If start successfully, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be:
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_START_UP
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_UP_PROGRESS
            • UpgradeProfile.ACTION_DEVICE_FINISH_UP
          • The keys of the message will show in KeyList of the action.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be UpgradeProfile.DEVICE_UP_ERROR
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        fwPath - The firmware file path
        fwInfoPath - The info file path
        crc - CRC checksum for info file
        appSecret - The AppSecret

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
